posts.post_content:
SOLD: Circa 1884 Old Judge smoking head. Not sure if this is considered a trade card or window display. Size is about 4-1/4" x 6-7/8". These seem to be a fairly scarce but a popular item.

Condition is good with some edge wear. Scrapbook glue staining on reverse. Color may be slightly faded, but not sure of that. Still looks pretty great regardless.

Price: SOLD shipped, paypal f/f preferred. The only other online sale I could find of this particular card in the set was an auction from a few years back at over $200.

PM or email with interest.

Thx,
Ray

Click through for larger scan:

[url=https://ibb.co/hYDLSv1][img]https://i.ibb.co/3RB4nHY/Old-Judge-Smoker-s.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://ibb.co/PGxFLtX][img]https://i.ibb.co/7tvjfbM/Old-Judge-Smoker-rev-s.jpg[/img][/url]
PM incoming.  I will take this.
